text:
Patch below for conf/web.xml:

- fix minor spelling mistakes
- reference parameters by '[parametername]', parameter values by "[value]" for
  easier reading
- reindent/format all paragraphs
- update comments: 
  * default servlet is disabled by default, too
  * update/add some documentation to "Welcome File List"
creator: yannc76@yahoo.de

text:
Created attachment 8088
Fix some typos/formatting, add/update some content
creator: yannc76@yahoo.de

text: It has been a while but I noticed this whilst I was scanning over the old Tomcat 4 issues. I have applied a variation of this patch to Tomcat 7 and it will be included in 7.0.5 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
